title: Rule Engine Config Schema
description: This schema is used to validate a rules profile to be used in the AG

entryPointRuleChainNames.description: Array containing entry point rule chain names

expressionName.description: Name of expression pointed by the rule

trueActions.description: Actions executed if expression returns true

ruleChainName.description: Name of the rule chain to call

falseActions.description: Actions executed if expression returns false

ruleChainName.description: Name of the rule chain to call
